Landing Page Builder - Guide

Walk-through for the landing page builder

Get Started →

Marketplace

Walk-thru on how to use templates, how to save templates and understand which template works for you best.

Page Editor

Walk-thru of the entire landing page builder. Learn about using each element, section, and layout management to bring your landing page to life just how you imagined it.

Forms

Learn how to connect forms work with your landing page, how to design, tag and pass data across multiple pages

Mobile optimization

Everything you need to know on how to make your page completely mobile responsive

Publishing

Learn how to publish your landing page on custom domains and share it on social media

Advanced

Take the landing page beyond. Learn how to use custom HTML, CSS or Javascript to create pop-ups, count-down timers, and other advanced configuration options
